/usr/bin/c++   -std=c++11 -O2 -Wall -fopenmp -pthread -fdiagnostics-color=auto   -Wl,-rpath -Wl,/usr/lib/openmpi -Wl,--enable-new-dtags -pthread -rdynamic CMakeFiles/run_all_cpptests.dir/run_all.cpp.o  -o run_all_cpptests  -Wl,-rpath,/home/dansan/neuromorphic/source/snn/nestkernel:/home/dansan/neuromorphic/source/snn/librandom:/home/dansan/neuromorphic/source/snn/sli:/home/dansan/neuromorphic/source/snn/libnestutil:/usr/lib/openmpi: /usr/lib64/libboost_unit_test_framework.so.1.72.0 ../../nestkernel/libnestkernel.so ../../librandom/librandom.so ../../sli/libsli.so ../../libnestutil/libnestutil.so -lgsl -lgslcblas -lltdl /usr/lib/openmpi/libmpi_cxx.so /usr/lib/openmpi/libmpi.so
